data.title: Our Hearts' Desire
data.meta_description: Something's missing isn't it? Are you searching for something that feels out of reach? Are you longing for something you can’t seem to find?
data.text:
SOMETHING’S

MISSING, ISN’T IT?

SOMETHING’S

ISN’T IT?

MISSING,

Are you searching for something that feels out of reach?

Are you longing for something you can’t seem to find?

You aren’t alone. All humans are born with the same desire—we want love, joy, peace, and abundance. The only problem is, very few of us ever find them. In a world filled with so many people with unmet desires, it’s no wonder why we feel so alone.

But it doesn’t have to be that way.

The truth is…

The stories we have always been drawn to (and perhaps thought were mere entertainment) have actually been invitations from God.

They aren’t just stories, they are whispers from our Father, and He wants us to hope in His promises.

A BRAND-NEW WAY TO EXPERIENCE GOD.

A BRAND-NEW WAY TO EXPERIENCE

GOD.

Discover God through your favorite stories.

With references to The Dark Knight, The Hunger Games, Friends, and dozens more, you’ll see your favorite stories in a brand-new light.

Feel connected like never before.

God is the Author of your story, and He is actually the cry of your heart. He wants you to know His character, and He wants you to know His love.

Experience the love, joy, and freedom you seek.

You are living in a story unlike any other. Once you open your eyes and step into this reality, God will give you the desires of your heart.

Order The Book

"My life’s mission is to create IMPACT, and I always encourage my clients to do the same. Bob’s words in this book will do exactly that. Not everyone grew up in the church, and many of us don’t know where to begin, but Our Hearts' Desire is a great primer for anyone who wants to begin their walk with God. I would recommend this book to anyone."

Founder of Fitness Quest 10; personal trainer on NBC’s STRONG; author of Get Your Mind Right; host of the IMPACT Show podcast

Todd Durkin

You don’t have to feel alone

ANYMORE.

You don’t have to feel alone

anymore.

The love, joy, and peace you seek are now within your reach.

At this point, you might be thinking to yourself “Look, I’ve tried everything… what good is reading a book going to do?”

And I get it! Trust me. That is exactly how I used to feel about life. No matter how good I thought I had been, no matter how hard I tried, I could never seem to shake my feelings of loneliness. My heart felt empty, lost, and desperate for affection. I was searching for something, and I wasn’t even sure what that was.

But not anymore.

That is the reason I wrote this book—I have finally found the desire of my heart, and I want you to find it too. I want you to experience the same transformation, and I want you to find the same joy. How do I propose to do this, you ask? Simple.

I want to open your eyes to our story.

At this point, you might be thinking to yourself “Look, I’ve tried everything… what good is reading a book

going to do?”

And I get it! Trust me. That is exactly how I used to feel about life. No matter how good I thought I had been, no matter how hard I tried, I could never seem to shake my feelings of loneliness. My heart felt empty, lost, and desperate for affection. I was searching for something, and I wasn’t even sure what that was.

ABOUT THE

AUTHOR

author

about the

I was searching for God my entire life.

The funny thing is, I didn’t even realize it.

My name is Bob Wheatley, and I’m a child of God living in Nashville, Tennessee. As an author, podcast host, and former professional athlete, I’ve been blessed to live a multi-faceted life. Before I wrote Our Hearts’ Desire, I played minor league baseball for the Toronto Blue Jays and the St. Louis Cardinals. I played baseball in dozens of states and multiple countries, and I chased what many would call a childhood dream. However, I can honestly say that God wasn’t my focus.

At that point in my life…
